title: Help the Hag Survivors
content: hag. (Quest Help the Hag Survivors, Avenge the Hag Survivors, Save Vanra. You need the Hag's Bane recipe.) Visit Flaming Fist barracks north of the Basilisk Gate and talk to Vanra's mother, After that investigate the Blushing Mermaid. However, the captain claims there's no missing child, and offers you gold to kill the mother. You need to refuse the offer, forcing Aunt Ethel to reveal her true form.
